attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into the grooming and rape gangs that prey on girls.
attributes.additional_details: The horrific detailed that are circulating in the national press need to be fully understood by the population and can only be properly investigated by a judge led public enquiry into the scandal since a number of public bodies seem to have been brought into disrepute including police forces.
attributes.background: Hold a debate on the grooming culture of young girls that seems so rife across the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
